Megatron nimbly kept flying around, to keep face to face with Mutate,
smoothly dodging left and right, waiting to try and crush this horrible
creation.
----------------------------------------------------------------------
"The darkness felt so cold, I was alone, and terrified. Ahhhh how I've
missed those feelings." He then felt mutate's pain. "Ahhhh, an old
friend, who is feeling pain. I must meet the one who iduced this.
RAMPAGE, TERRORIZE." At the command, the ground tore opend, leaving the
monster predacon to break free from the earth that was his grave since
the Predacon's last stand against the Maximals. He looked around, and
could see nothing, but could feel the spark he wanted. He leapt into the
air, and converted into his tank mode, landing on the ground with a
large thud, as he started to roll towards the new Maximal city.
